node.statement: Step 1.1.4 (Positive semi-definiteness): For q > 0 real, the quantum 3j symbols are real-valued (since q-numbers [n]_q are real for q > 0). Therefore Q_q^dagger is the Hermitian adjoint of Q_q in the standard Fock space inner product. It follows that H_q = Q_q Q_q^dagger + Q_q^dagger Q_q >= 0 as an operator, with ker(H_q) = ker(Q_q) intersect ker(Q_q^dagger).
